00057         template<typename T>
00058         class OSSCallbackPointer : public OOSCallback
00059         {
00060 
00061         public:
00062 
00063                 typedef void (T::*MemberFunction)(OgreOggISound* sound);
00064 
00065                 OSSCallbackPointer() : mUndefined(true){}
00066 
00067                 OSSCallbackPointer(MemberFunction func, T* obj) :
00068                         mFunction(func),
00069                         mObject(obj),
00070                         mUndefined(false)
00071                 {}
00072 
00073                 virtual ~OSSCallbackPointer(){}
00074 
00075                 void execute(OgreOggISound* sound)
00076                 {
00077                         if(!mUndefined)
00078                                 (mObject->*mFunction)(sound);
00079                 }
00080 
00081         protected:
00082

00084                 T* mObject;

00087         };
